name: 魏敏樺
objective:
透過本課程的介紹與討論，將可使學生了解土木工程領域的範圍，可能從事的工作與未來的可能發展，並讓修習學生了解土木工程相關領域的力學、數學及其他基礎學科之重要知識及最先進之研究成果或最新開發成品。
The course exposes students to the field of civil engineering. It also introduces students to the mechanics, mathematics and fundamental sciences implemented in landmark civil engineering projects, as well as design issues and latest practices in civil engineering.
scorePolicy:
Attendance: 10%
Homework: 40%
Midterm Exam: 25%
Final Exam: 25%
materials: Power Point Presentation files, Movies, Site visits prepared and organized by me!
